short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Constructs debate cites from html tags or page info and copies to clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cite Creator is a cross-browser extension that creates cites for use primarily in US high school or college competitive debate. It's designed to work well with the Verbatim template (https://paperlessdebate.com). Includes keyboard shortcuts for quickly modifying/copying the cite.
